title: Scythe
description: In a world where death has been conquered, Scythes are the only ones who can end life—and they are commanded to do so to keep the population under control.

title: Thunderhead
description: The Thunderhead cannot interfere in the affairs of the Scythedom. All it can do is observe—it does not like what it sees.

title: The Toll
description: In the highly anticipated finale to the Arc of a Scythe trilogy, secrets are revealed and the fate of humanity hangs in the balance.

title: The Adventure Zone: Here There Be Gerblins
description: Based on the wildly popular Dungeons & Dragons podcast, this graphic novel brings the McElroys' hilarity to the page.

title: The Adventure Zone: Murder on the Rockport Limited!
description: The second graphic novel from The Adventure Zone series, full of murder, mystery, and laughs aboard a magical train.

title: The Hunger Games
description: Katniss Everdeen volunteers to take her sister's place in a fight to the death in the Hunger Games.

title: Catching Fire
description: The second book of the Hunger Games trilogy, Katniss faces rebellion and new challenges in the arena.

title: Mockingjay
description: Katniss becomes the face of rebellion in the stunning conclusion to the Hunger Games trilogy.
A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A story of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the Deep South.
